snippet: Blindly copying Western-style democracy can only bring disaster, an influential Chinese Communist Party journal wrote in its latest edition following more than a week of pro-democracy protests in Hong Kong....

headline.print_headline: China Party Journal Says Copying Western Democracy Brings Disaster
headline.main: China Party Journal Says Copying Western Democracy Brings Disaster

lead_paragraph: Blindly copying Western-style democracy can only bring disaster, an influential Chinese Communist Party journal wrote in its latest edition following more than a week of pro-democracy protests in Hong Kong.
